name: prius_chaser
text: At the 7th inning stretch, guess what Davide does.

name: jaydub
text: A comment left by jaydub was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by TwoRightFeet, goocifer, woof, honestabe)

name: overmedicated
text: Gets the mad munchies?

name: featurelessvoid
text: A comment left by featurelessvoid was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ShemmJacc, Rhadamanthus, ketamind)

name: straw
text:
You're just not the same since you changed icons.

But Milkman Dan is the shit.

Just sayin.

name: goocifer
text: Gets grilled and eaten with some risotto and some crispy stellas by the rest of the team.  There's probably enough of him for everyone.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: He's a pigeon. He does what they all do in ballparks.

name: vulpes-aurum
text: WHY FIND OUT?

name: kalethan
text: he fixes the cable?

name: afastidioushat
text: Stoned Lightning is an excellent slow pitch softball team name. It's like a beer league with a better chance of someone getting nailed in the face by a softball but feeling good about it.

name: ford
text: I need to find a decent beer league.  This is the only way i can see myself playing sports, if i get to be all Arty Lange about it.

name: dropkickpikachu
text:
This comment was prophecy and you didn't even know it.

I'm assuming this comment was made the day this strip came out, right? I'm not one such as a historian on assetbar.

name: mrphaethon
text: A comment left by mrphaethon was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by dianahamilton, smich, honestabe)

name: nyu
text: Hilarious! Nightlife Mingus could be the manager.

name: scramblesthedog
text: A comment left by scramblesthedog was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by MrPhaethon, NeoNaoNeo, science, prius_chaser, mandatoryLOVR, mira, ethelthefrog, Fcannon)

name: science
text: The pic is also very similar to the 4th panel in [url="http://m.assetbar.com/achewood/uuaftZZMW"]this strip[/url].  Credit to you for pointing out the reference, but "got to reuse"?  Do people say Coppola "got to reuse" Pacino in Godfather II?

name: cashprizes
text: good one. though i kind of feel like that by number 3.

name: scramblesthedog
text: No, but people say that sitcoms "got to reuse" flashback footage in their clip shows of later seasons.

name: science
text: True enough.  So we'll go with thanks for pointing out the reference.  I would have otherwise missed it.

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by joeyramoney, apocowarg, EM2, Ketters)

name: lyss
text: "This is hideous !"; I submit that this replace such distasteful slang such as "this is WICKED!"

name: slaaaaabs
text: Gooooo Nugs!

name: 2kings
text:
This is hideous!!
i love everything ray says!

name: theoneyouwant
text: charcoal grill AND a beer cooler at each base.

name: donsoze
text: I love the attention paid to the process of getting stoned. Lesser writers would have gone straight from bong to "Slow pitch softball!"

name: wae
text: i feel like i'm right there with him, making that decision based on those circumstances

name: trebuchet
text: I am tremendously excited about the baseball ringer t that will surely come out of this strip.

name: londoncatfish
text: dang straight.  i'm prayin' this logo gets the t-shirt treatment.

name: grayfox
text: I concur.

name: brian
text: if it doesn't i might have to make a bootleg copy of my own. i have technology, don't push me, onstad.

name: closefriend
text: This is going to go swimmingly until the match against the Coked-Up Hurricane.

name: threebong
text: Classic Ray.

name: supernintendochalmers
text: good ol ray

name: wolfslice
text: Teodor's ramble in panel 6 is my favorite thing about this strip. I've comitted it to memory.

name: hotttcarl
text: How long before we see Stoned Lightning shirts in the store?

name: raccoon
text:
I MUST HAVE A STONED LIGHTNING T-SHIRT PLEASE.

I AM NAMED DAVIDE AND I AM STONED AND I AM LIGHTNING.

name: tekende
text: AND WE ARE ALL TOGETHER

name: doctorother
text: There is absolutely no other appropriate name for such a mascot.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Stoned Lightning sounds like a sweet band.

name: alzuna
text: I can clearly hear a guy yelling it all in a screechy 80's hair metal voice.

name: fineoakstructure
text: You sure you're not imagining John Travolta screaming "why it's GREASED LIGHTNING! "?

name: alzuna
text: Maybe, but that's more like zealous singing, not really that 'metal I'm gonna smash some guitars after I finish this verse yell' you know?

name: misterwolf
text:
I have been known to design the odd logo for pay. Every night I get on my knees and pray to God that someone will come and ask me to design something like that.

Tedore is a lucky bastard.

name: dianahamilton
text: Ray saying "i want to play with that little psycho and learn his name" makes me extremely uncomfortable

name: pascal
text: Honestly know, if Onstad made this a shirt, how many of us would buy enough to start our own sports teams?

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by fosters, rowboat, bug, cryptfiend85, Darthemed)

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Zefiel, fosters, rowboat, bug, HeyMan, wehavemagnums, Darthemed)

name: fosters
text: Perhaps you opinion was lame? Just going out on a limb here.

name: satellitetv
text: Oh, the dawning realization of slow pitch softball.

name: mortshire
text: i get pretty excited imagining ray going coming up to me, stoned as all, and whispering into my ear gently, softly:"DAH-vi-day."

name: billyamericana
text: I can't say that my first reaction to a little psycho is to play with him. But Davide is not your normal little psycho - he's got the look of a thrilled Snowball snack cake.

name: krautdog
text: This gets a "5" just for "we can do whatever in hell we want!  This is LIFE!"  I think people should have this tattoo instead of a jaguar ripping the skin.

name: huber
text: YES! this is LIFE! was the true gem in that strip. It is just further proof that Ray is the true spirit of Tao in the modern age.

name: cailetshadow
text: And maybe under the text is a little image of a Tonka dumptruck, just completely tipping over into a sinkhole.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: spinynorman
text:
Or a goddamn swallow.

I swear to god, I see more swallows flitting across kids' skin than under an overpass over a goddamn river

How come you kids are so GOD DAMNED stupid and just the stupidest thing every SINGLE SECOND OF THE GOD DAMNED DAY

name: mangtastic
text:
It was and still is trendy to subjugate things into one's own culture, and the swallow tattoos are but one of many examples.

I believe the swallow tattoos were originally things of sailors (as were pea coats, another hiply subjugated item). I guess nautical stuff is cool to copy? The next hip items that all the kids will be into: scurvy, gay sex (for the men), mal de debarquement, and being isolated with the same group of people for weeks/months at a time.

name: huber
text: But yeah, rad strip, rad

name: shayne
text: Imagine what that chick in your class who has a different colour of glasses every couple of weeks is going to say when she sees you in the form-fitting T that is sure to come from this.

name: tekende
text: "That shirt looks good on his body"?

name: taiiga
text: Oh my god! Slow pitch softball!

name: gormster
text: Why did Ray sound out the name? Surely he pronounced it right the first time?

name: nutmeg
text: this strip makes me soooo..... happy.

name: jackparsons
text: Nah, the Acid Rangers are known to rule the diamond. Dock Ellis is their patron saint.

name: nigelchaos
text: AWESOME reference! Everyone who doesn't know Dock Ellis should look him up and then bow down to Jackparsons!

name: straw
text: Baseball is very important to baseball players.

name: nigelchaos
text: haha.. I'd like to see *you* pitch a no hitter on acid.

name: rowboat
text:
OH HELL AND DAMN YES!!

[IMGS OFF]

The man's my hero.

name: straw
text: I can barely articulate how awesome this is.  Maybe if I had more rum...

name: alzuna
text: For some reason this seems to go well with the Beastie Boys' Intergalactic, which is on the radio right now .

name: nigelchaos
text: that is awesome, rowboat.

name: gherittwhite
text: Ray has to sound out DAH-vi-day because "Davide" came out of his mouth as text in a little speech bubble.

name: em2
text: For our benefit. Or maybe just because he's stoned.

name: mindbnder
text: All games begin at 4:20.

name: rowboat
text: Or not.

name: deusoma
text: Asthmatics encouraged to sit in the back of the bleachers.

name: rhadamanthus
text: Cannabis is a bronchiodilatory. Not to advocate inhaling burning plantatyer for asthma, but I know a fellow who gets asthma relief from his vaporizer (which is far healthier anyways).

name: dwodles
text: Every panel is brilliant.

name: drago25
text: If only there were teams like when I was a kid, maybe I wouldn't of turned out this way.

name: seymourglass
text: It's always a great feeling when you find out a friend was getting simultaneously high as you.

name: mattylite
text: I know it's the most common type of comment in all acheworld to talk about how you've adopted some mannerism of the strip into your day-to-day life.  It is now my turn to continue this dubious tradition.  I am on a softball team called Stoned Lightning.  We suck, and the other achewood fan on my team is the only one who doesn't hate the name.

name: doctorbeene
text: I'm proud of that. Talking in front of your non-AW friends about AW usually excludes them and makes you(me) feel like a loner.

name: rowboat
text:
Wow. Now I know the chronological mechanism on this site is fucked. That was way more than "1 years ago."

Anyway, we are no longer called Stoned Lightning and now we kick much ass. It's just a coincidence. I still think that was the coolest possible team name.

name: doctorbeene
text: Do you think that Onstad thinks it's lame that we remember Roast beef's birthday? (It was yesterday.)

name: tekende
text: I'm impressed that Teodor could design that logo and mascot while high. Whenever I try to draw while stoned, I inevitably forget what I was drawing halfway through and then turn the drawing into a picture of David Bowie.
